t: Amazon Pickup Points Spread Across Major College Campuses | Campus Solutions, Inc.
s: Growing from an online bookstore into a world-spanning tech behemoth, the company has recently been making waves amongst college students. Their new Pickup Lockers have been installed on over 30 major college campuses, allowing students to pick up their orders within 2 days of ordering them.
